The `manager` packages provides functions for reading external data.

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(manager)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
data <- read_manages3("C:/path/to/manages/Site.mdb")
```

Example data sets for groundwater in Indiana and Ohio are provided with the 
package

```{r}
data("ohio_data")
data("indiana_data")
```
